fields.description:
I want to display the Registered Trademark (®) symbol as SUPERSCRIPT across all mobile devices.
I am able to display the symbol on the interface but not as superscript.
Please confirm on how to achieve the same... what approach to follow?

Thanks
fields.summary: Display Registered Trademark (®) symbol as SUPERSCRIPT
fields.environment:
Across all Mobile Platforms 
* Android
* iOS
* Windows Phone

comments.body:
Hello, You can use text as "My company\u00AE" for registered trademark symble as unicode.

More referance:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6189121/how-to-show-superscript-for-registered-symbol
http://www.javascripter.net/faq/mathsymbols.htm

There are more suggestion in gogle. Hope this helps.

Regards,
Sharif.

Hi Sharif,
Thankyou so much.
The solution you have given works on Android and iOS.
But it is NOT working on Windows. Can you please provide a solution for Windows Phone?
